001package com.technototes.library.hardware.servo;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.ElapsedTime;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
005
006// TODO: Make this use a normal Servo on not a technototes servo
007public class ServoProfiler {
008    private final Servo servo;
009    private double maxVel, maxAccel, targetPosition, servoRange, targetTolerance;
010    private final ElapsedTime deltaTime;
011    private double delta;
012    private double proportion;
013
014    public static class Constraints {
015
016        public double maxVelocity, maxAcceleration, proportion;
017
018        public Constraints(double vel, double accel, double prop) {
019            maxVelocity = vel;
020            maxAcceleration = accel;
021            proportion = prop;
022        }
023
024        public double getMaxVelocity() {
025            return maxVelocity;
026        }
027
028        public double getMaxAcceleration() {
029            return maxAcceleration;
030        }
031
032        public double getProportion() {
033            return proportion;
034        }
035    }
036
037    public ServoProfiler(Servo s) {
038        servo = s;
039        setServoRange(0.75);
040        setTargetTolerance(0.01);
041        deltaTime = new ElapsedTime();
042        delta = 0;
043    }
044
045    public ServoProfiler setConstraints(double vel, double accel, double prop) {
046        maxVel = vel;
047        maxAccel = accel;
048        proportion = prop;
049        return this;
050    }
051
052    public ServoProfiler setConstraints(Constraints c) {
053        return setConstraints(c.maxVelocity, c.maxAcceleration, c.proportion);
054    }
055
056    public ServoProfiler setServoRange(double rangeInRotations) {
057        servoRange = rangeInRotations;
058        return this;
059    }
060
061    public ServoProfiler setTargetPosition(double target) {
062        targetPosition = target;
063        deltaTime.reset();
064        return this;
065    }
066
067    public ServoProfiler translateTargetPosition(double translation) {
068        return setTargetPosition(Range.clip(0, targetPosition + translation, 1));
069    }
070
071    public ServoProfiler setTargetTolerance(double tolerance) {
072        targetTolerance = tolerance;
073        return this;
074    }
075
076    // fun method to update servo
077    public ServoProfiler update() {
078        // if at the target dont do anything
079        if (isAtTarget()) return this;
080        // set the past delta pos
081        double pastDelta = delta;
082        // get the change in time, then reset the timer instantly
083        double deltaSec = deltaTime.seconds();
084        deltaTime.reset();
085
086        // generate the new change in servo pos.
087        // range.clip makes the change fit the max constraints
088        // the min and max make sure both constraints are hit
089        // the deltasec makes it independent of looptime
090        delta = Range.clip(
091                deltaSec * servoRange * proportion * (getTargetPosition() - getCurrentPosition()),
092                Math.max(pastDelta - maxAccel * deltaSec, -maxVel * deltaSec),
093                Math.min(pastDelta + maxAccel * deltaSec, maxVel * deltaSec));
094        servo.setPosition(getCurrentPosition() + delta / servoRange);
095
096        return this;
097    }
098
099    public boolean isAtTarget() {
100        return Math.abs(getCurrentPosition() - getTargetPosition()) < targetTolerance;
101    }
102
103    public double getCurrentPosition() {
104        return servo.getPosition();
105    }
106
107    public Servo getServo() {
108        return servo;
109    }
110
111    public double getMaxVel() {
112        return maxVel;
113    }
114
115    public double getMaxAccel() {
116        return maxAccel;
117    }
118
119    public double getTargetPosition() {
120        return targetPosition;
121    }
122
123    public double getTargetTolerance() {
124        return targetTolerance;
125    }
126}
